Name: Knowledge_Engine_001
ContentCN: 火箭发动机通过燃烧推进剂产生高速气流，利用牛顿第三定律（作用力与反作用力）产生推力。主要类型包括液体火箭发动机和固体火箭发动机。液体发动机使用液态燃料和氧化剂，可以控制推力大小；固体发动机结构简单但推力不可调。
ContentEN: Rocket engines generate thrust by burning propellant to produce high-speed exhaust gas using Newton's third law. Main types include liquid and solid rocket engines. Liquid engines use liquid fuel and oxidizer with controllable thrust while solid engines are simpler but have fixed thrust.

Name: Knowledge_Fuel_001
ContentCN: 液氧（LOX）和液氢（LH2）是一种高性能推进剂组合。液氢温度为-253°C，液氧温度为-183°C。这种组合具有最高的比冲（约450秒），燃烧产物只有水蒸气，非常环保。但储存困难，需要隔热容器。
ContentEN: LOX and LH2 form a high-performance propellant combination. LH2 is at -253°C and LOX at -183°C. This combination has the highest specific impulse (about 450s) with water vapor as the only combustion product making it environmentally friendly. However storage is challenging requiring insulated containers.

Name: Knowledge_MultiStage_001
ContentCN: 多级火箭通过分阶段抛弃已用完燃料的部分来减轻质量，提高效率。这基于齐奥尔科夫斯基火箭方程。一级火箭在大气层内工作，提供最大推力；二级在高空继续加速；有些火箭还有三级。级间分离使用爆炸螺栓或机械装置。
ContentEN: Multi-stage rockets improve efficiency by discarding empty fuel stages to reduce mass based on Tsiolkovsky rocket equation. First stage works in atmosphere providing maximum thrust second stage continues acceleration at altitude some rockets have third stage. Stage separation uses explosive bolts or mechanical devices.

Name: Knowledge_Control_001
ContentCN: 火箭姿态控制系统使用陀螺仪测量姿态，通过推力矢量控制或辅助发动机调整方向。推力矢量控制通过调整主发动机喷嘴角度改变推力方向。姿态控制发动机（RCS）使用小型推进器进行精确调整。
ContentEN: Rocket attitude control system uses gyroscopes to measure orientation and adjusts direction through thrust vector control or auxiliary engines. Thrust vector control changes thrust direction by adjusting main engine nozzle angle. Reaction Control System (RCS) uses small thrusters for precise adjustments.

Name: Knowledge_Fairing_001
ContentCN: 整流罩是火箭顶部的保护罩，在大气层内飞行时保护载荷免受空气动力学压力、摩擦热和振动的影响。当火箭到达稀薄大气层（约100-150公里高度）后，整流罩会分离抛弃，减轻重量。整流罩通常分为两半，使用弹簧或小型火箭推开。
ContentEN: Fairing is the protective cover at rocket's top protecting payload from aerodynamic pressure friction heat and vibration during atmospheric flight. When reaching thin atmosphere (about 100-150km altitude) the fairing separates and is discarded to reduce weight. Fairings typically split into two halves using springs or small rockets.

Name: Knowledge_History_001
ContentCN: 现代火箭技术始于20世纪。1957年苏联发射第一颗人造卫星。1969年阿波罗11号登月。中国长征系列火箭自1970年代开始发展。近年来SpaceX猎鹰9号实现火箭回收重复使用，大幅降低成本。未来火箭将更加环保、经济、可靠。
ContentEN: Modern rocket technology began in 20th century. USSR launched first satellite in 1957. Apollo 11 landed on moon in 1969. China's Long March series developed since 1970s. Recently SpaceX Falcon 9 achieved rocket recovery and reuse dramatically reducing costs. Future rockets will be more eco-friendly economical and reliable.
